ygData.subject: Re: Pulsating brood clutch (off-topic)
ygData.msgSnippet: ********WARNING****Slight Spoiler******* Gee Galtin, I am glad I went to Freeport and got Anthem and Bellow finally last night, but it sounds like you had a
ygData.messageBody:
********WARNING****Slight Spoiler*******

Gee Galtin, I am glad I went to Freeport and got Anthem and Bellow finally
last night, but it sounds like you had a very interesting evening in the
Faydark!

I have heard about the Crookstinger wasp for some time, but only in rumor as
all the people I ever spoke to about it had never seen it before. Even
rangers have spent a long time waiting around lfaydrk to get this named NPC
wasp on tracking to no avail.

The thing about the Crookstinger is that its stinger can be used as a magic
attack weapon:

"The crookstinger is found an a named Wasp in Lesser Faydark. This is a good
low level magic weapon as it can be obtained at <10 levels. It has a damage
of 4, a delay of 21 and also has a weak poison effect. " - taken from:
http://www.gameznet.com/eq/equipment/crookstinger.html

It seems logical to me that attacking lots of giant wasps is what causes
this NPC to spawn although I have never thought of it before. Be careful to
keep this thread within our little bard list or suddenly in a few days you
will hear "auctioning crookstinger dagger, 3pp, give tell" all over the
gfaydrk zone ;-)

- Faras the drunkard bard

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn
> [mailto:ReeceT@...]
> Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 5:45 PM
> To: EQBards
> Subject: [eqbards] Pulsating brood clutch (off-topic)
>
>
> From: "Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn" <ReeceT@...>
>
> Sorry about posting off-topic but for some reason I have
> email access but
> not Internet access. As a result, I can't post this question
> on EQVault.
>
> Last night while adventuring in Lesser Faydark, my party was
> attacked by the
> Spider Queen (can't remember her last name). I had never
> seen this NPC
> before so perhaps this is part of a new quest. I do know we
> killed a lot of
> giant spiders so that may have caused her to spawn. Anyway,
> after we killed
> her, I looted an item called a pulsating brood clutch.
> Right-clicking on
> the item only displayed the name and the weight. Didn't
> mention anything
> like Lore/Magic item. I asked around and no one had ever
> heard of this
> item. I went to a shop and was offered 7PP for it. Thinking
> it may be a
> quest item, I decided not to sell it. I also looted a poison
> sac from the
> Queen. The icons for the two items are similar, both looking
> like a kidney.
> My guess is if this item is not a quest item, it can be used
> by a rogue to
> create poison, although I don't think this skill has been
> implemented yet.
>
> Does anyone have any information on this item? I need the PP
> but if its
> part of a quest would like to try and solve it.
>
> On a related note, I saw three other named NPCs in Lesser Faydark last
> night. One was Crookstinger, a NPC wasp, another was a named
> fairie whose
> name I can't recollect, and the unicorn Equestrielle. In
> addition to the
> Spider Queen, I had never seen any of these NPCs before.
> There were several
> groups in the area attacking both wasps and fairie creatures.
> The general
> consensus of everyone in the area was that killing these
> creatures caused
> Crookstinger and the named fairie to appear. No one was foolish/brave
> enough to attack the unicorn. Its good to see that Verant
> has started to
> beef up some of the zones. Has anyone notived similar
> additions in other
> zones?
>
> Galtin
> E'ci
